title: Chest bugs
body: I cannot receive a hextech chest even when I got plenty of S for 2 weeks already.

replies.body: It might be that you've already earned a chest for the champions you've been playing. Remember that you can only earn [**one chest for each champion**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) per season.
I just bought leona and got an S on it but still, I did not receive the hextech chest, and the chest available on my account are 4

Hmmmm I dug into your account a little more and it looks like there's something kind of weird going on. I don't want to give out too much of your personal account info, so hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can give you the rundown of what's going on!
